answerText: Vidiadhar Surajprasad Naipaul [10] ] Naipaul may be best known for this work where the overbearing Tulsi family makes the protagonist long for the titular structure.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Chicago Culture Heroes and Psychopomps | 20 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The 2008 Patrick French biography of this man details his long-running abuse of his wife Patricia Hale. FTPE,   [10] First, identify this author that refused to acknowledge Hale even existed in his loosely autobiographical Enigma of Arrival.
